transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Haan, kaun mam Himani ji?
Customer: Nahi sir, main Himani ki manager baat kar rahi hu Ashima bataye.
Customer: Mere ko thoda hamara Pushpa Decor ka naam Pushpa Decor hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Hamara dukan ka naam Pushpa Decor hai.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji mujhe pata hai sir bataye aage.
Customer: Mere ko call Hyderabad ka call mere ko na wo add karna hai Hyderabad ka.
Executive: Achha.
Executive: Koi nahi main abhi Himani se call karwa rahi hu aapko, theek hai? Aap usko bata dijiye wo kar degi, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Okay sir, thank you sir. Himani Pushpa Decor client ko phone karo.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to add Hyderabad call to account.



Resolution:

- Executive will have Himani call the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will have Himani call the customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, add, hyderabad
